<td width="75">4:57PM</td>
</tr><tr class="bg2"><td width="75">5:19PM</td>
<td width="75">5:27PM</td>
<td width="75">F</td>
<td width="75">5:40PM</td>
<td width="75">5:45PM</td>
<td width="75">5:50PM</td>
<td width="75">5:57PM</td>
</tr></table></td></tr></table></span><div class="demand"><strong>F = Flag Stop.</strong> Persons wanting to board will have to signal the bus driver.</div>	  <a name="bigpic"><img border=0 src="/mrnpics/15_Jan.jpg"></a><br>
	  route 15 map</div>		<div class="clearFloats"></div>

<td>

    <td>
    <form method="get" action="temp.php">
    <label for="stopid"><select onChange="submit(); return true" id="stopid" name="stopid" style="background-color: #EEEEEE; color:#000000; font-size: 7pt; font-weight:normal; font-family: Verdana; margin-top:3px" ><option value="">---TCAT Stops---</option>

<script type="text/javascript">
//Start Tab Content script for UL with id="maintab" Separate multiple ids each with a comma.
if ($('maintab')) {
    initializetabcontent("maintab")
}
if ($('maintab2')) {
    initializetabcontent("maintab2")
}
</script>

		<a href="http://tcat.nextinsight.com/"><img src="/images/tripplanner.jpg" alt="Trip Planner" width="285" height="153" border="0" /></a>&nbsp;<a href="http://www.tcatbus.com/pages/system"><img src="/images/downloadtcatmaps.jpg" alt="Download TCAT Maps" width="285" height="153" border="0" /></a>&nbsp;<a href="http://www.tcatbus.com/buy.php"><img src="/images/tcat_card.jpg" alt="Buy A Pass" width="285" height="153" border="0" /></a>

		<h1>Route 81 Schedule and Map </h1>
    	<p><a href="#bigpic"><img src="/mrnpics/825thumb.jpg" alt="routeThumb" border="0" align="left" class="map"/></a>

      <p class="mapLink"><a href="#" map>Cornell Daytime Campus Service</a></p>
	    <table width="890" border="0" cellspacing="3">
        <tr>
          <td colspan="20" bgcolor="#8cd2ef" class="heading"><h6>South Bound</h6></td>
        </tr>
        <br><h5>Route 81 Weekdays</h5><tr class="tableSub"><td>A Lot</td>
<td>B Lot</td>
</tr>
<tr align="center" class="tableSub"><td>A</td>
<td>B</td>
</tr>

<td width="75">4:58AM</td>
</tr><tr class="bg2"><td width="75">5:15AM</td>
<td width="75">5:28AM</td>

<table width="435" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" summary="This table contains the dropdown for quick access to a route or stop page.">
  <tr valign="middle">
  	<td>Quick Views:</td>
    <td>

<div id="tcontent1" class="tabcontent">

<table width="435" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" summary="This table contains the dropdown for quick access to a route or stop page.">
  <tr valign="middle">
  	<td>Quick Views:</td>
    <td>
    <form method="get" action="temp.php">

<td>
